name: Mimecast App for Sumo Logic
description: Dashboards for Mimecast Secure Email Gateway

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Acc" and dir = "Inbound" 
| timeslice 1d 
| count as count by _timeslice 
| sort by _timeslice asc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Acc" and dir = "Outbound" 
| timeslice 1d 
| count as count by _timeslice 
| sort by _timeslice asc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Acc" and dir = "Internal" 
| timeslice 1d 
| count as count by _timeslice 
| sort by _timeslice asc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Acc" and dir = "External" 
| timeslice 1d 
| count as count by _timeslice 
| sort by _timeslice asc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where rejtype != null 
| count by rejtype 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where delivered = "false" and rejtype != null 
| count by rejtype 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where hld != null 
| count by hld 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Rej"
| where spamscore > spamlimit
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Rej"
| where spamscore > spamlimit
| count by spaminfo 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Rej"
| where spamscore > spamlimit
| count by rcpt 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Rej"
| where spamscore > spamlimit
| count by sender

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where Act = "Rej"
| where spamscore > spamlimit
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = ip 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code 
| sort _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where act = "Acc" and tlsver != null and dir != null
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where act = "Acc" and tlsver = null and dir != null
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where usetls = "No" and delivered = "true" and dir != null
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where delivered = "true" and tlsver != null and dir != null
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where tlsver != null 
| timeslice 1d 
| count by tlsver, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column tlsver

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where tlsver != null 
| count as count by cphr 
| sort cphr

panels.title: Inbound Sending Domains Not Using TLS

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where usetls = "No" and dir = "Inbound" 
| split rcpt delim='@' extract 1 as user, 2 as domain 
| count as count by domain 
| sort by count

panels.title: Outbound Recipient Domains Not Using TLS

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where usetls = "No" and dir = "Outbound" 
| split rcpt delim='@' extract 1 as user, 2 as domain 
| count as count by domain 
| sort by count

children.name: Mimecast - TTP URL Protect
children.description: Mimecast Targeted Threat Protection - URL Protect dashboard
children.title: Mimecast - TTP URL Protect

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc
| json auto
| where action != "None" 
| where !isNull(action) 
| timeslice 1d 
| count by action, _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column action 
| sort by _timeslice asc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where url != null 
| count by route 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where url != null 
| count by urlcategory 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where url != null and action in ("Block", "Browser Isolation") 
| count as count by recipient, sender, subject, url, sourceip 
| sort by count desc

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where url != null and action = "Browser Isolation" 
| count by url 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where url != null and action = "Block" 
| count by url 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where virus != null 
| count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where virus != null 
| count by virus 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where virus != null 
| count by rcpt 
| limit 10 
| sort by _count

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where virus != null 
| count by fileext

$$logsrc
| json auto 
| where virus != null 
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = ip 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code 
| sort _count
